long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension allows users to easily listen to selected text in the world's 10 most popular languages. By integrating a simple and user-friendly interface, you can select your preferred language from a dropdown menu and hear the text spoken aloud using a high-quality Text-to-Speech (TTS) service. The extension supports English, Chinese (Mandarin), Hindi, Spanish, French, Arabic, Bengali, Portuguese, Russian, and Japanese, enabling you to experience content in multiple languages with just a click. Perfect for language learners, global travelers, or anyone looking to understand content in another language.

Key Features:
Listen to any selected text in 10 of the world's most widely spoken languages.
Choose your preferred language using an intuitive dropdown menu with country flags.
Seamless integration with Googleâ€™s Text-to-Speech service for high-quality audio.
User-friendly interface with quick language switching.
Ideal for language practice, accessibility, or learning pronunciation in different languages.

How to Use:
Select the text you want to hear on any webpage.
Open the extension and choose your desired language from the dropdown menu.
The extension will play the selected text in your chosen language.
Enhance your browsing experience by listening to content in multiple languages!
